LIFE INSURANCE

Secure a

new future

and narrative for your family

Learn how life insurance can provide vital financial protection, help you navigate the “What ifs...?” of life, build lasting wealth, and transform diverse and underserved communities.

Here are uses to life insurance that most don’t realize, or have not been taught:

Protect your loved ones

In the event of your passing, your family will receive a tax-free payout to replace your income and help with their financial needs.

TYPES OF LIFE INSURANCE

Grow and safeguard your money, now and into the future

Life insurance comes in two primary types: term life and permanent life. While both types offer protection for you and your loved ones, they differ in terms of coverage duration and financial flexibility. W&E encourages you to own BOTH types of policies as you build your personalized life insurance plan.

“Term life insurance covers a specific time period, making it ideal for short-term needs like paying off a mortgage or funding your kid’s education.”.”

Jeremy P

Wealth & Equity Advisor

Build your personalized insurance plan called: A Roadmap-For Life

Address these “What ifs...?” that may arise in life

What if I die too soon?

Start with term life insurance to protect your Personal Wealth Potential, ensuring your loved ones’ financial needs are met.

What if I get sick and can’t work?

Term life insurance with living benefits allows you to access your payout should you fall critically ill, providing support for medical care.

What if I need more cash?

Secure a permanent life insurance policy for tax-deferred growth and tax-free access to cash through policy loans. Create your own bank.

What if I want to fund my own inheritance?

Consider taking out life insurance plans on parents or grandparents and coming together with other family members to pay the cost.

What if I want financial freedom for my children?

Purchasing life insurance on your child can lock in their insurability, and provide funds for education, a new business, or home purchase.

What if I want to leave a meaningful legacy behind?

Life insurance can be used to provide inheritance to your family, and donations to a church, HBCU, or a treasured organization.

Frequently asked

LIke purchasing insurance coverage on your car, house and phone to protect their values if lost or damaged, life insurance coverage should be purchased to protect the economic value of your life and your ability to work, in case you die unexpectedly, or fall ill. Considering that you will probably earn millions of dollars in your lifetime, this protection could be the most important financial product you'll ever buy.

Based on your Personal Wealth Potential, Wealth & Equity matches you with trusted insurers that have the solutions for your unique needs. Speak to our financial experts for additional ongoing support.
